title: Girl's Head
text: In this stark woodcut, Erich Heckel shows his girlfriend and future wife Sidi Riha as she was convalescing from a long illness. The unguarded image reveals her physical and psychological hardship.
description: First cut 1913, block remarked by the artist, 1920
creditline: The Miscellaneous Works of Art Purchase Fund
